snippet.title: The Train: Escape to Normandy (C64 Version), Accolade™,1987
snippet.description:
The Train: Escape to Normandy™ is a lot of fun - very good graphics, fun game play and a really good story line to hook you into it. While it's not the best game ever, it's definitely way above average, and you'd be completely mad not to have a go at this one! Recommended!...
--
http://www.lemon64.com
---
PC MS-DOS Version here - http://youtu.be/P1Y-wC8yJ94
